# Quarterly Vendor Sync: Anthropic Claude Deployment

**Meeting Type:** Quarterly Business Review  
**Vendor:** Anthropic  
**Product:** Claude AI Platform  
**Duration:** 90 minutes  
**Frequency:** Quarterly  

---

## Meeting Objectives

- Review Claude deployment status and usage metrics
- Provide strategic roadmap feedback and align on future capabilities
- Address escalated support issues and technical challenges
- Submit and prioritize feature requests
- Discuss security, compliance, and governance concerns
- Strengthen partnership and identify mutual opportunities

---

## Attendees

### Our Organization
- [ ] Enterprise Architect / Technical Lead
- [ ] Security Officer / InfoSec Representative
- [ ] Product Owner / Business Stakeholder
- [ ] Implementation Team Lead
- [ ] Compliance Officer (as needed)

### Anthropic
- [ ] Account Manager / Customer Success Manager
- [ ] Solutions Engineer / Technical Account Manager
- [ ] Product Manager (as needed)
- [ ] Security/Compliance Representative (as needed)

---

## Agenda

### 1. Opening & Deployment Overview (10 minutes)

**Our Updates:**
- [ ] Current deployment status and rollout progress
- [ ] User adoption metrics and usage statistics
- [ ] Key success stories and wins since last quarter
- [ ] High-level challenges or concerns

**Anthropic Updates:**
- [ ] Recent platform updates and releases
- [ ] Upcoming changes relevant to our deployment
- [ ] Industry trends and competitive landscape insights

---

### 2. Roadmap Feedback (25 minutes)

**Discussion Topics:**
- [ ] Review Anthropic's product roadmap for next 6-12 months
- [ ] Alignment with our organization's strategic initiatives
- [ ] Feedback on planned features and capabilities
- [ ] Priority capabilities we need for our use cases
- [ ] Beta program opportunities for early access

**Our Roadmap Feedback:**
```
Priority 1 (Critical):
- [Capability/Feature]
- [Business justification]
- [Expected timeline]

Priority 2 (Important):
- [Capability/Feature]
- [Business justification]
- [Expected timeline]

Priority 3 (Nice to have):
- [Capability/Feature]
- [Business justification]
- [Expected timeline]
```

**Anthropic Roadmap Alignment:**
- [ ] Features scheduled for delivery this quarter
- [ ] Features under consideration based on customer feedback
- [ ] Research initiatives that may impact future capabilities

---

- [ ] Identify opportunities to improve support experience

---

### 5. Security & Compliance Concerns (15 minutes)

**Security Topics:**

#### A. Current Security Posture
- [ ] Review of Claude's security architecture and updates
- [ ] Recent security audits, certifications, or attestations
- [ ] Security incident reports (if any) and remediation
- [ ] Data residency and data sovereignty considerations
- [ ] Encryption standards and key management updates

#### B. Compliance Requirements
- [ ] Regulatory compliance updates (SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, HIPAA, etc.)
- [ ] Industry-specific compliance needs
- [ ] Data retention and deletion policies
- [ ] Third-party security assessments
- [ ] Compliance documentation and evidence requests

#### C. Governance & Risk Management
- [ ] Access controls and authentication mechanisms
- [ ] Audit logging and monitoring capabilities
- [ ] Data handling and privacy controls
- [ ] Acceptable use policies and guardrails
- [ ] Incident response procedures and contacts

**Open Security Concerns:**
```
Concern #1:
- Issue: [Description]
- Risk Level: Critical / High / Medium / Low
- Required Action: [What needs to be addressed]
- Timeline: [When resolution is needed]

Concern #2:
- Issue: [Description]
- Risk Level: Critical / High / Medium / Low
- Required Action: [What needs to be addressed]
- Timeline: [When resolution is needed]
```
